00002 #include "Lgm/Lgm_Quat.h"

00004 double Lgm_NormalizeQuat( double Q[4] ) {
00005 
00006     double  mag, mag_inv;
00007 
00008     mag     = sqrt(Q[0]*Q[0] + Q[1]*Q[1] + Q[2]*Q[2] + Q[3]*Q[3]);
00009     if ( mag > 1e-12 ) {
00010 
00011         mag_inv = 1.0/mag;
00012         Q[0] *= mag_inv;
00013         Q[1] *= mag_inv;
00014         Q[2] *= mag_inv;
00015         Q[3] *= mag_inv;
00016 
00017     } else {
00018         /*
00019          *  Normalize to the identity quaternion
00020          */
00021         Q[0] = Q[1] = Q[2] = 0.0;
00022         Q[3] = 1.0;
00023     }
00024 
00025     return( mag );
00026 
00027 }

00029 double Lgm_MatrixTrace( double A[3][3] ) {
00030     return( A[0][0] + A[1][1] + A[2][2] );
00031 }

00035 /*
00036  *  Routine to compute a quaternion rotation from a 3x3 rotation matrix.
00037  *    double A[3][3];         -- Trans Matrix
00038  *    double Q[4]             -- Quaternion (qx, qy, qz, qw)
00039  */
00040 void Lgm_MatrixToQuat( double A[3][3], double *Q ) {
00041 
00042     double  T, SqrtT, f, finv;;
00043 
00044     T = 1.0 + Lgm_MatrixTrace( A );
00045 
00046     if ( T >= 0.0 ) {
00047         SqrtT = sqrt( T );
00048         Q[3] = 0.5*SqrtT;
00049 
00050         f = 0.25/Q[3];
00051         Q[0] = (A[2][1]-A[1][2]) * f;
00052         Q[1] = (A[0][2]-A[2][0]) * f;
00053         Q[2] = (A[1][0]-A[0][1]) * f;
00054 
00055     } else {
00056 
00057         if ( (A[0][0] > A[1][1]) && (A[0][0] > A[2][2]) ) { 
00058            f = sqrt( 1.0 + A[0][0] - A[1][1] - A[2][2] ) * 2.0; // f=4*qx 
00059            finv = 1.0/f;
00060            Q[0] = 0.25 * f;
00061            Q[1] = (A[0][1] + A[1][0]) * finv; 
00062            Q[2] = (A[0][2] + A[2][0]) * finv; 
00063            Q[3] = (A[1][2] - A[2][1]) * finv;
00064         } else if (A[1][1] > A[2][2]) { 
00065            f = sqrt( 1.0 + A[1][1] - A[0][0] - A[2][2] ) * 2.0; // f=4*qy
00066            finv = 1.0/f;
00067            Q[0] = (A[0][1] + A[1][0]) * finv; 
00068            Q[1] = 0.25 * f;
00069            Q[2] = (A[1][2] + A[2][1]) * finv; 
00070            Q[3] = (A[0][2] - A[2][0]) * finv;
00071         } else { 
00072            f = sqrt( 1.0 + A[2][2] - A[0][0] - A[1][1] ) * 2.0; // f=4*qz
00073            finv = 1.0/f;
00074            Q[0] = (A[0][2] + A[2][0]) * finv; 
00075            Q[1] = (A[1][2] + A[2][1]) * finv; 
00076            Q[2] = 0.25 * f;
00077            Q[3] = (A[0][1] - A[1][0]) * finv;
00078         }
00079 
00080     }
00081 
00082 
00083 }
00084 
00085 void Lgm_Quat_To_Matrix( double Q[4], double A[3][3] ) {
00086     A[0][0] = 1.0 - 2.0 * (Q[1] * Q[1] + Q[2] * Q[2]);
00087     A[0][1] = 2.0 * (Q[0] * Q[1] - Q[2] * Q[3]);
00088     A[0][2] = 2.0 * (Q[2] * Q[0] + Q[1] * Q[3]);
00089 
00090     A[1][0] = 2.0 * (Q[0] * Q[1] + Q[2] * Q[3]);
00091     A[1][1]= 1.0 - 2.0 * (Q[2] * Q[2] + Q[0] * Q[0]);
00092     A[1][2] = 2.0 * (Q[1] * Q[2] - Q[0] * Q[3]);
00093 
00094     A[2][0] = 2.0 * (Q[2] * Q[0] - Q[1] * Q[3]);
00095     A[2][1] = 2.0 * (Q[1] * Q[2] + Q[0] * Q[3]);
00096     A[2][2] = 1.0 - 2.0 * (Q[1] * Q[1] + Q[0] * Q[0]);
00097 }

00100 /*
00101  *  This routinem determines the quaternion implied by the rotation angle and axis.
00102  *
00103  *  Output:
00104  *      Q[4]  -- four element array containing Qx, Qy, Qz,Qw
00105  *
00106  *  Input:
00107  *
00108  *      Angle -- angle (in degrees) of rotation.
00109  *      u     -- unit vector of rotation axis.
00110  *
00111  *
00112  */
00113 void Lgm_AxisAngleToQuat( Lgm_Vector *u, double Angle, double *Q ) {
00114 
00115     double a, sa;
00116 
00117     // rotate by Angle deg. around u axis
00118     a = 0.5*Angle*RadPerDeg; sa = sin( a );
00119     Q[0] = sa*u->x;
00120     Q[1] = sa*u->y;
00121     Q[2] = sa*u->z;
00122     Q[3] = cos( a );
00123 
00124 }
00125 
00126 
00127 
00128 /*
00129  *  This routinem determines the angle and axis of rotation implied
00130  *  by a (normalized) quaternion.
00131  *
00132  *  Input:
00133  *      Q[4]  -- four element array containing Qx, Qy, Qz,Qw
00134  *
00135  *  Output:
00136  *
00137  *      Angle -- angle (in degrees) of rotation.
00138  *      u     -- unit vector of rotation axis.
00139  *
00140  *
00141  */
00142 void Lgm_QuatToAxisAngle( double *Q, double *Angle, Lgm_Vector *u ) {
00143 
00144     double  Aover2, SinAover2, SinAover2_inv;
00145 
00146 
00147     /*
00148      * Force normalization of Q
00149      */
00150     Lgm_NormalizeQuat( Q );
00151 
00152     if ( (1.0-fabs(Q[3])) < 1e-8 ) {
00153 
00154         /*
00155          *  Rotation angle is close to zero
00156          *  (Its either A/2 = 0 (i.e. A = 0) or
00157          *  A/2 = 180 (i.e. A = 360))
00158          *  Rotation axis is arbitrary
00159          */
00160         *Angle = 0.0;
00161         u->x = 0.0;
00162         u->y = 0.0;
00163         u->z = 1.0;
00164 
00165     } else {
00166 
00167         /*
00168          *  Determine Angle/2
00169          */
00170         Aover2 = acos( Q[3] );
00171         *Angle = 2.0*Aover2*DegPerRad;
00172 
00173         /* 
00174          * Compute 1.0/sin(Angle/2)
00175          */
00176         SinAover2 = sqrt( 1.0 - Q[3]*Q[3] );
00177         SinAover2_inv = 1.0/SinAover2;
00178 
00179         /*
00180          *  Compute components of rotation axis
00181          */
00182         u->x = Q[0]*SinAover2;
00183         u->y = Q[1]*SinAover2;
00184         u->z = Q[2]*SinAover2;
00185 
00186 
00187     }
00188 
00189 
00190 
00191 }

00195 /*
00196  *  Given a Quaternion, and a vector, computes the rotated vector.
00197  */
00198 void Lgm_QuatRotateVector( double *Q, Lgm_Vector *v, Lgm_Vector *vp ) {
00199 
00200     double xx = Q[0]*Q[0];
00201     double yy = Q[1]*Q[1];
00202     double zz = Q[2]*Q[2];
00203     double ww = Q[3]*Q[3];
00204 
00205     double xw = Q[0]*Q[3];
00206     double yw = Q[1]*Q[3];
00207     double zw = Q[2]*Q[3];
00208 
00209     double xy = Q[0]*Q[1];
00210     double xz = Q[0]*Q[2];
00211     double yz = Q[1]*Q[2];
00212 
00213     vp->x = ww*v->x + 2.0*yw*v->z - 2.0*zw*v->y + xx*v->x + 2*xy*v->y + 2.0*xz*v->z - zz*v->x - yy*v->x;
00214     vp->y = 2.0*xy*v->x + yy*v->y + 2.0*yz*v->z + 2.0*zw*v->x - zz*v->y + ww*v->y - 2.0*xw*v->z - xx*v->y;
00215     vp->z = 2.0*xz*v->x + 2.0*yz*v->y + zz*v->z - 2.0*yw*v->x - yy*v->z + 2.0*xw*v->y - xx*v->z + ww*v->z;
00216 
00217     return;
00218 
00219 
00220 }

00224 /* 
00225  * return the magnitude of a vector
00226  */
00227 double Lgm_QuatMagnitude( double *Q ) {
00228     return( sqrt( Q[0]*Q[0] + Q[1]*Q[1] + Q[2]*Q[2] + Q[3]*Q[3]) );
00229 }
00230 
00231 double Lgm_QuatVecLength( double *v ) { return ( sqrt(v[0]*v[0] + v[1]*v[1] + v[2]*v[2]) ); }
00232 double Lgm_QuatVecDot( double *v1, double *v2 ) { return v1[0]*v2[0] + v1[1]*v2[1] + v1[2]*v2[2]; }
00233 void Lgm_QuatVecZero( double *v ) { v[0] = 0.0; v[1] = 0.0; v[2] = 0.0; }
00234 void Lgm_QuatVecSet( double *v, double x, double y, double z ) { v[0] = x; v[1] = y; v[2] = z; }
00235 void Lgm_QuatVecAdd( double *a, double *b, double *c ) { c[0] = a[0] + b[0]; c[1] = a[1] + b[1]; c[2] = a[2] + b[2]; }
00236 void Lgm_QuatVecSub( double *a, double *b, double *c) { c[0] = a[0] - b[0]; c[1] = a[1] - b[1]; c[2] = a[2] - b[2]; }
00237 void Lgm_QuatVecCopy( double *v1, double *v2 ) { int i; for (i = 0 ; i < 3 ; i++) v2[i] = v1[i]; }
00238 void Lgm_QuatVecScale( double *v, double f ) { v[0] *= f; v[1] *= f; v[2] *= f; }
00239 void Lgm_QuatVecNormalize( double *v ) { Lgm_QuatVecScale( v, 1.0/Lgm_QuatVecLength(v) ); }
00240 
00241 void Lgm_QuatVecCross( double *a, double *b, double *c ) {
00242     c[0] = (a[1]*b[2]) - (a[2]*b[1]);
00243     c[1] = (a[2]*b[0]) - (a[0]*b[2]);
00244     c[2] = (a[0]*b[1]) - (a[1]*b[0]);
00245 }
00246 
00247 void Lgm_QuatCombineQuats( double Q1[4], double Q2[4], double Q[4] ) {
00248 
00249     double  t1[4], t2[4], t3[4];
00250     double  tf[4];
00251 
00252     Lgm_QuatVecCopy( Q1,t1 );
00253     Lgm_QuatVecScale( t1,Q2[3] );
00254 
00255     Lgm_QuatVecCopy( Q2,t2 );
00256     Lgm_QuatVecScale( t2,Q1[3] );
00257 
00258     Lgm_QuatVecCross( Q2, Q1, t3 );
00259     Lgm_QuatVecAdd( t1, t2, tf );
00260     Lgm_QuatVecAdd( t3, tf, tf );
00261     tf[3] = Q1[3]*Q2[3] - Lgm_QuatVecDot( Q1, Q2 );
00262 
00263     Q[0] = tf[0]; Q[1] = tf[1]; Q[2] = tf[2]; Q[3] = tf[3];
00264 
00265 }
